description.value:
Inflict Righteous Fury on 9 or 10 when attacking relevent foe. Gain +10 to Intimidate Tests if they know of the squad's reputation. Some of them may have Hatred(Your Squad) Kill Markers can't be acquired, only earned.

Requirements

Informal Kill Marker: Squad has Completed five Full Campaigns, or slain 500 of a particular foe. Such as Orks, Rebels, Dark Eldar, Chaos Worshippers, Kroot, Etc.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
